subject: Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mike Brown led the Cavaliers to the N.B.A. finals in 2006-7 and to the Eastern Conference finals last season, but Cleveland was eliminated in the second round this season.
snippet: Mike Brown led the Cavaliers to the N.B.A. finals in 2006-7 and to the Eastern Conference finals last season, but Cleveland was eliminated in the second round this season.
